Invocation Name: transport bot
des:
The Transport Bot is an Alexa skill that provides convenient and real-time information about transportation connections between cities in Germany. Simply ask Alexa for the next connection between your desired "fromCity" and "toCity," and the Transport Bot will fetch the latest data to provide you with accurate and up-to-date information on the next available transportation option.

Key Features:

Easy Connection Information: Get quick access to the next available transportation connection between two cities in Germany without the need to manually search for schedules or routes.
Real-time Updates: The Transport Bot uses live data to ensure that the information provided is current, giving you the most accurate details on departure times, arrival times, and any potential delays.
Multiple Transport Modes: The skill covers various transportation modes, including trains, buses, trams, and other public transport options, providing a comprehensive view of available connections.
Voice-Activated Convenience: Simply ask Alexa for the next connection between your desired cities, and the Transport Bot will provide you with the information without requiring you to navigate complex websites or apps.
Clear and Concise Responses: The skill offers clear and concise responses, providing essential details such as departure times, duration of the journey, transfer information, and arrival times.
How to Use:

Enable the Transport Bot skill on your Alexa device.
Say, "Alexa, ask Transport Bot for the next connection from [fromCity] to [toCity]."
Alexa will fetch the latest transportation information and provide you with details on the next available connection, including departure times, durations, and any transfer information.
The Transport Bot skill is your reliable companion for planning and navigating transportation connections in Germany. Whether you're a local commuter or a visitor exploring the country, this skill will assist you in efficiently finding your next connection. Stay informed, save time, and travel with confidence using the Transport Bot skill on your Alexa device.
